channel.title: ToXiC-pk Scape
channel.description:
[size=30pt] ToXiC-pk Scape[/size]
I have been working on this for about 2 weeks now... And I will be releasing it very soon, I have just got to fix a few things up...
Credits: Pimpscape, of course... (the base) Reapage scape v2 (I have gotten some idea's of it :p ) And last but not least... To all the people on mopar, for their support and Tutorials...
(Green writing = Done, Yellow writing = half-way done, red writing = haven't started)
Added silabs! added new quest's! added some new mini's! added fully working barrows! added all new training area! added fully working genie lamps! Added fully working specials! Fixed all those annoying shop bugs! added fully working potion's! (All of them, used my very own... Potionhandler) More quest's. more mini's. more items (mabye custom). More shops. more pking place's. Fixing beard and mouth bug... Adding training stages... Need to fix some of the special timers (dds spec)... fixing that teleport bug (stay small)...
[size=20pt]The best part of all, The pic's![/size]
The Home + Starting outfit! [IMG]http://img220.imageshack.us/img220/8468/startingpl0.png[/img][IMG]http://img220.imageshack.us/img220/startingpl0.png/1/w761.png[/img][/URL] Shops! [IMG]http://img145.imageshack.us/img145/3476/shoppingmk8.png[/img][IMG]http://img145.imageshack.us/img145/shoppingmk8.png/1/w761.png[/img][/URL] Wildy! (at home) [img]http://img230.imageshack.us/img230/9294/wildyif2.png[/img] Another wildy pic (at home) [img]http://img386.imageshack.us/img386/8889/pkerij8.png[/img] Lol, The bank :p [img]http://img47.imageshack.us/img47/2470/banksqd4.png[/img] Combat related skills... (thanks repage :p ) [img]http://img383.imageshack.us/img383/7195/attackmi6.png[/img] Now silab's! [img]http://img379.imageshack.us/img379/1145/silabscz5.png[/img] training man hole! [img]http://img386.imageshack.us/img386/8872/trainingac1.png[/img] Training Area [img]http://img91.imageshack.us/img91/3412/trainingplacege1.png[/img]
Well, Thats it atm... As i have been very busy with other stuff, I will post more pics, as soon as i do updates!

this makes it good because you need too work hard for a good thing

[size=30pt]
ToXiC-pk Scape[/size]

I have been working on this for about 2 weeks now…
And I will be releasing it very soon, I have just got to fix a few things up…

Credits:
Pimpscape, of course… (the base)

added new quest’s!

more mini’s.
